contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox station | name= CentrePort/DFW Airport Station [[Image:20 airtransportation.svg|17px]] | image=CentrePort-DFW.jpg | image_size=275px | image_caption= Riders at CentrePort/DFW Airport station boarding the TRE train. | address= 14470 Statler Boulevard<br>Fort Worth, Texas 76155 | coordinates= {{coord|32.8170|-97.0526|format=dms|display=inline,title|region:US_type:railwaystation}} | line= {{rail color box|system=DART|line=TRE}} | other=[[Fort Worth Transportation Authority|The T]] Route 30 (Circular) <br>DART Route {{DART RFB|500}} (M-Sat), and {{DART SH|803|DFW Airport Circular}} (M-Sat) | platform=1 [[side platform]], 1 [[island platform]] | tracks=2 | parking=free, no overnight | bicycle=bike lockups | passengers= | pass_year= | pass_percent= | opened= September 16, 2000<ref name="September 16, 2000">{{cite news | last =Ellis | first =Tiara M. | title =Rail line inaugurates new service today: Cities getting transit connection to Dallas, Fort Worth marking day with celebrations | work =The Dallas Morning News | date =September 16, 2000}}</ref> | rebuilt= | ADA=Yes | code= | owned= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit]] | zone= Western TRE Fare Zone | services= {{s-rail|title=Trinity Railway Express}} {{s-line|system=DART|line=TRE|previous=Hurst/Bell|next=West Irving}} }} '''CentrePort/DFW Airport Station''' is a [[Trinity Railway Express]] [[commuter rail]] station located just south of [[Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport]] on Statler Boulevard. It opened on September 16, 2000, and is a station on the [[Trinity Railway Express|TRE commuter line]], serving the CentrePort business park, the headquarters of [[American Airlines]], and all terminals of DFW Airport. Connections to all DFW airport terminals are free but require riding two shuttle buses: first the shuttle to the DFW Remote South lot, then connecting there to the terminal shuttles. ==Gallery== <gallery> File:TRE Budd Rail diesel car.jpg|The TRE Budd Diesel Car </gallery> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.trinityrailwayexpress.org/centreportdfwairport.html TRE - CentrePort/DFW Airport Station] * [http://dfwairport.com/transport/public/p1_007746.php DFW Airport - TRE Ground Transportation] {{DEFAULTSORT:CentrePort DFW Airport (TRE station)}} [[Category:Trinity Railway Express stations]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 2000]] [[Category:Airport railway stations in the United States]] [[Category:Dallas Area Rapid Transit]] {{Texas-railstation-stub}}
